text: Stephanie "Steffi" Grebe (born September 24, 1987) is a German para table tennis player who was born without her left and right forearms, she is a right-handed player. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Paralympic table tennis players of Germany Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Table tennis players at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Table tennis players at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Living people Category:Paralympic medalists in table tennis Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Germany
title: Stephanie Grebe
